New Records: Jason Holder became the first West Indies bowler to take a four-wicket hat-trick in a T20I match
Key Match Events: Jason Holder took a hat-trick in the last over to seal the victory for West Indies
Sam Billings hit a late boundary to give England hope but fell short
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies elected to bat first after winning the toss
England struggled with death bowling and lost key players early
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder praised the team's resilience and discipline
Kieron Pollard credited the team's effort and unity
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match had the highest number of sixes in a bilateral T20I series
West Indies secured the series 3-2 after this victory
